effect.en: As long as the Defending Pokémon’s remaining HP is 60 or less, this attack’s base damage is 60 instead of 30.
Rampardos does 20 damage to itself. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

description.en: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.
